title: The Superhero Women
description: The Superhero Women strike back! Another valiant volume in the Marvel Origins series, stories of the start of your favorite Marvel maidens--including Ms. Marvel, disguised as the editor of a women's magazine, who has super strength and the power of flight; Red Sonja, more than the equal of any man and known as the She-Devil with a sword; Medusa, one of the Inhumans, her hair is horror for baddies; Janet Van Dyne, wealthy socialite who can shrink to insect size, float like a butterfly and sting like The Wasp that she is; and The Cat, Greer Nelson, as graceful, athletic and inscrutable as her name. Liberate yourself from worries with the women's side of super sagas in The Superhero Women!
author: Stan Lee
